name: Curve.fi Factory USD Metapool: DOLA-3pool Curve LP
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and DOLA, a synthetic USD stablecoin that can be minted by using other assets on Inverse Finance (https://www.inverse.finance) as collateral.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and DOLA, a synthetic USD stablecoin that can be minted by using other assets on Inverse Finance (https://www.inverse.finance) as collateral.

This metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and DOLA, a synthetic USD stablecoin that can be minted by using other assets on Inverse Finance (https://www.inverse.finance) as collateral.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y DOLA, una moneda estable USD sintética que se puede acuñar utilizando otros activos en Inverse Finance (https://www.inverse.finance) como garantía.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu meta havuz, 3Crv (DAI, USDC ve USDT) ve teminat olarak Inverse Finance'teki (https://www.inverse.finance) diğer varlıklar kullanılarak basılabilen sentetik bir USD sabit parası olan DOLA'yı içerir.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 3Crv (DAI, USDC, USDT) 和 DOLA。DOLA 是由 Inverse Finance (https://www.inverse.finance) 发行的稳定币，通过在其平台超额抵押其它加密资产铸造而成。
